name: Cubes (itch) (Iplayli)
description:
Entry for Extra Credits Game Jam #4 (Theme: Connect)

A mind-challenging game. You can destroy 2 blocks when they are the same color and next to each other. Destroy all blocks to win the game.

All levels are 100% doable.

If you just want to play the game download Cubes.zip
If you want to view my code download cubesUnityProject.zip
